content: I cannot access current or personal opinions of individuals, groups or entities. however, the welsh rugby union has been known to embrace the use of technology to improve performance. in recent years, the union has made significant investments in state-of-the-art video analysis software and gps tracking systems, and has provided these tools to its teams and coaches. these technologies allow for better understanding of player performance, nutrition, and training, and can help identify areas for improvement. the welsh rugby union has also embraced the use of social media and other digital platforms to reach fans and promote the sport.
